entry.title: Feynman's Flowers
entry.summary: Feynman's Flowers is a citizen cyberscience project where the volunteers can help classifying nano-molecules (that look like flowers).

entry.title: PyBossa
entry.summary: PyBossa is an open-source framework that allows professional and amateur scientists to run web applications (that can be deployed in Crowdcrafting.org) for solving problems where the human minds are required.
